title: Beat the devil (Special edition)
creator_credit: Romulus Films, Santana, Jack Clayton and John Huston
brief_description: The story of a motley group of swindlers travelling on an Africa-bound tramp steamer. The plot unfolds to reveal a web of double crossing and deception as each attempts to get their hands on a fortune in uranium deposits. Starring Gina Lollobrigida and Humphrey Bogart. Written by Truman Capote and John Huston from a novel by James Helvick. This version includes an introduction by Tony Curtis and a bonus clip of the original theatrical trailer for Humphrey Bogart’s ‘The Big sleep’.
